general: The moon in Cancer and the nodes of destiny urge you to listen to what your heart desires, dear Scorpio. Although external circumstances beyond your control may have created some obstacles, the only acceptable path to follow is the one illuminated by your intuition. It is essential to embrace spiritual practices to align yourself with the universe, placing your faith in the divine powers that flow within you and around you. You may feel stronger insecurities today, as the imbalanced aspects of the moon, Jupiter, Mercury, and Venus make you more sensitive than usual. If your nerves begin to fray, take a moment to recharge and pamper yourself at home.
love: Be attentive to your partner's emotional needs.
work: Seek to resolve conflicts with diplomacy at work.
health: Take time for relaxing and spiritual activities.
advice: Listen to your intuition to move forward.
